summary: All three agents unanimously classify this email as HAM with high confidence. The email is a legitimate internal business communication reminding team members about a scheduled organizational retreat. It contains specific details, references shared context, and shows no spam indicators.
key_evidence: References previously distributed calendar from fall semester
Contains specific dates and organizational context (neon leaders retreat, January 5-6)
Demonstrates familiarity with recipients and acknowledges their busy schedules
No commercial offers, suspicious URLs, or manipulation tactics
All three agents detected business_correspondence and specific_details patterns
